metadata.title: A Beautiful Mind -- Groks Science Show 2002-05-01
metadata.creator: Charles Lee and Frank Ling
metadata.description: The life and times of mathematician John F. Nash Jr. have garnered a great deal of attention since the release of the popular movie, A Beautiful Mind, chronicled events in his life. This show featured an interview with Sylvia Nassar, the author of Nash's biography, who discussed Nash's struggles with math, schizophrenia, and the Nobel Prize.
metadata.subject: Science
metadata.notes: Visit the Groks Science Show Home Page at: WWW.GROKS.NET
